Log 2016/4/8:
{"doc":"[ ] optimize [x]platform.f ls.f and editor.f [ ] ls.f ed expport + platform.f storage works fine now. Local storage fields may not be an edit box document. How to avoid them from being opened by edit box? An edit box document is a local storage field that has {doc,readonly,mode} fields. So this is enough to tell.

[ ] Move older log to local storage.

[ ] what if local storage usage become huge? An archive method is needed. [ ] I twisted the ls.f to bring in the older code into new eb format of doc,readonly,mode and it works for autoexec but can't edit unless after saved!!?? ","mode":true,"readonly":false}
